hint.text:
Try and use the method completing the perfect square
For example :
\(a^2+8a+15\)
\(=a^2+8a+4^2-4^2+15\,\)[Adding and subtracting \(4^2\)]
\(=a^2+(2)(a)(4)+4^2-1\)
\(=(a+4)^2-1\)
Now use the identity \(a^2-b^2=(a-b)(a+b)\)
\(=(a+4-1)(a+4+1)\)
\(=(a+3)(a+5)\)

Try and use the method completing the perfect square

\(=a^2+(2)(a)(4)+4^2-1\)

Now use the identity \(a^2-b^2=(a-b)(a+b)\)

\(=(a+3)(a+5)\)

Remember that some algebraic expressions can be factorized using identities. These are some common identities :
\(a^2+2ab+b^2=(a+b)^2\)
\(a^2-2ab+b^2=(a-b)^2\)
\(a^2-b^2=(a+b)(a-b)\)
\(a^3-b^3=(a-b)(a^2+ab+b^2)\)
\(a^3+b^3=(a+b)(a^2-ab+b^2)\)

solution.text:
\((3a+11y)^2-5(3a+11y)+6\)
Let \(x=3a+11y\)
\(=x^2-5x+6\)
Notice that \(x^2-5x+6\,\) can be written as \(x^2+(-2-3)x+(-2)(-3)\)
Using identity \(x^2+(a+b)x+ab=(x+a)(x+b)\)
\(=(x-2)(x-3)\)
Now substitute \(x\,\) for \(3a+11y\)
\(=(3a+11y-2)(3a+11y-3)\)

hint.text:
Remember that \((x+a)(x+b)=x^2+(a+b)x+ab\)
For example:
\(x^2+13x+36\,\)can be written as \(x^2+(9+4)x+(9)(4)\)
\(\Rightarrow x^2+13x+36=(x+9)(x+4)\)

solution.text:
\(x^2+14x+45\)
Notice that \(x^2+14x+45\,\)can be written as \(x^2+(5+9)x+(5)(9)\,\)
Using identity : \(x^2+(a+b)x+ab=(x+a)(x+b)\)
\(\Rightarrow x^2+(5+9)x+(5)(9)=(x+5)(x+9)\)

hint.text:

\(\Rightarrow x^2+13x+36=(x+9)(x+4)\)

solution.text:
\(y^2+15y+44\)
Notice that \(y^2+15y+44\,\)can be written as \(y^2+(4+11)y+(4)(11)\,\)
Using identity : \(x^2+(a+b)x+ab=(x+a)(x+b)\)
\(\Rightarrow y^2+(4+11)y+(4)(11)=(y+4)(y+11)\)

hint.text:

solution.text:
\(t^2+5t-14\)
Notice that \(t^2+5t-14\,\)can be written as \(t^2+(7-2)t+7(-2)\,\)
Using identity : \(x^2+(a+b)x+ab=(x+a)(x+b)\)
\(\Rightarrow t^2+(7-2)t+7(-2)=(t+7)(t-2)\)

hint.text:
Remember that \((x+a)(x+b)=x^2+(a+b)x+ab\)
For example:

\(\Rightarrow x^2+13x+36=(x+9)(x+4)\)

solution.text:
\(s^2-6s-40\)
Notice that \(s^2-6s-40\,\)can be written as \(s^2+(4-10)s+4(-10)\,\)
Using identity : \(x^2+(a+b)x+ab=(x+a)(x+b)\)
\(\Rightarrow s^2+(4-10)s+4(-10)=(s+4)(s-10)\)

\(a^2+2ab+b^2=(a+b)^2\)
\(a^2-2ab+b^2=(a-b)^2\)
\(a^2-b^2=(a+b)(a-b)\)
